name: God of Dungeon
description:
Innovative game mode, the perfect elimination of connection elimination and role-playing, enter the never-ending battle!
The gameplay is very simple. In the game, the same kind of props in the up, down, left, and right directions can be eliminated. You can also connect the weapons and monsters directly.HP is cleared, and the monsters are completely destroyed!
Come and experience the fun of endless killing and unlimited combos!

Game features:
- Connection elimination is simple
- Puzzle & RPG
-Global Athletics Ranking
-Free mobile game
